pizzas.name: Margherita Pizza
pizzas.description: Delicious classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

pizzas.name: Pepperoni Pizza
pizzas.description: Tasty pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni slices.

pizzas.name: Hawaiian Pizza
pizzas.description: Controversial but delicious pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, and pineapple.

pizzas.name: Vegetarian Pizza
pizzas.description: Flavorful vegetable pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, mushrooms, bell peppers, and olives.

pizzas.name: Barbecue Pizza
pizzas.description: Irresistible pizza with barbecue sauce, mozzarella, shredded beef, and caramelized onions.

pizzas.name: Four Cheese Pizza
pizzas.description: Exquisite pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, blue cheese, goat cheese, and Parmesan cheese.

pizzas.name: Seafood Pizza
pizzas.description: Delicious seafood pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, shrimp, mussels, and clams.
